item.description:
This is the 17th Annual Guitar Under the Stars Music Festival. A "don't miss" event!

Don’t miss the sensational line up of local and international guitarists performing a gamut of musical styles. Daniel Salazar, Jr. takes the evening stage accompanied by the Hartford Festival Orchestra in this signature concert featuring Spanish, Latin, and World Music. In addition, several of New England’s top guitarists will perform a variety of music styles throughout the afternoon. Produced in collaboration with the Connecticut Guitar Society

The event runs from 4 - 10 but let's target 6pm for the evening events. If anyone is interested in going earlier please note it in the RSVP. Bring some snacks for the show. If anyone is interested we can grab a bite or a drink afterward.

4:00 PM Nancy Tucker: acoustic guitarist/singer/comedian SPECIAL FAMILY SHOW!
5:00 PM Preston Reed: trailblazing acoustic guitar master
6:00 PM In Deep: the best of Classic Rock
7:30 PM Daniel Salazar Ensemble with the Hartford Festival Orchestra plus special guests


This is one of my favorite annual events at Hartford's riverfront. I hope to see you there!
item.how_to_find_us: Meet at the top of he stairs at 6pm.
item.name: Guitar Under the Stars
